name: getVappSnapshotInstantRecoveryOptionsV1
description: Retrieve the available vApp network connections and the default vApp network connection for the virtual machines in a vApp snapshot. Use this information to configure an Instant Recovery of specified virtual machines in the vApp snapshot.

snapshot_id.description: ID assigned to a vApp snapshot object.

$ul: **availableVappNetworks**: An array of network connections available through the specified vApp object.
**restorableVms**: An array of virtual machines that can be restored and their associated default network connections.
